channel.title: Code Requests
channel.description:
Okay... Well. I was wondering if someone could help me out...
Firstly, is there any way to get it so that when females put on a top, it doesn't still look like a guy top. A code for that, or at least for only drag chain, would be very helpful.
Secondly, I was wondering if there is a code or whatever to get rid of the bug where, if someone disconnects during a trade the opposite person will loose the items that they had put up for trade?
Finally, is there a way to make the ::char command avaliable to all users rather than just administrators?
Thanks for the help, -Alexia

item.title: Code Requests
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay… thanks guys.

Anyone have any ideas for the other two things?

-Alexia[br][size=1]Posted at: October 10, 2006, 06:01:37 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 11, 2006, 01:05:06 AM[/size][hr]Anyone at all?

Read full topic

no its says something like if playerrights>2 then change it so the 2 is a 0 i think, u might wana try a 1 lol i forget

item.description:

it doesnt say player rights 3 on it lol just make it into a command on the emotion buttons and it will work for everyone

item.title: Code Requests
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“alexia, post:1, topic:17785”]Okay… Well. I was wondering if someone could help me out…

Firstly, is there any way to get it so that when females put on a top, it doesn’t still look like a guy top. A code for that, or at least for only drag chain, would be very helpful.

Secondly, I was wondering if there is a code or whatever to get rid of the bug where, if someone disconnects during a trade the opposite person will loose the items that they had put up for trade?

Finally, is there a way to make the ::char command avaliable to all users rather than just administrators?

Thanks for the help,
-Alexia[/quote]
For the char command, go in to client.java and search for “char” untill you come to the command, delete the bit saying like if players 3 or something.

Read full topic
